about: I graduated with Magna cum Laude Honors from Middlebury College with a BA. in Computer Science. I am a Kenyan currently living in the US who is looking for Entry-Level Software Engineering opportunities as I further my CS skills. Please reach out if you believe I could provide I could be a great fit for a project/position

experiences.info: Worked at a Research Assistant in Middlebury College's CS department. Developed algorithms to efficiently schedule rides for the Tri-Valley Transit company in Central Vermont
Digitized systems and acted as a System Administrator for the International Students and Scholar Services office at Middlebury College
Consulted for the Orvis Company through the MiddCORE program and helped boost their reach to millennial clientele amid the COVID pandemic
Tutored and mentored high achieving high school graduates in Kenya and enabled them entry into prestigious American Institutions
Worked as a customer facing employee in the Ruiru, Kenya branch helping customers to undertake bulk transactions as well as providing micro-financing to smaller businesses

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.info: Built this web application using React JS, Node and Firebase to showcase my web development and UI/UX skills

projects.title: Proficiency Tracker Web App
projects.info: Built a Proficiency Tracking web application for professors to track student progress in an ungraded course. Utilized Scrum, Agile and Test-Driven development skills in a team of 10 to ensure proper functionality

projects.title: Dial-A-Ride Web App
projects.info: Built a web application using Django to enable clients in Central Vermont to request rides through the Dial-A-Ride service provided by Tri-Valley Transit. Utilized CS fundamentals to create Greedy algorithms for optimal schedule generation

projects.title: Handwriting Recognition Desktop App
projects.info: Built a desktop notepad using the Qt framework and C++ and made use of Symbolic Reasoning AI to translate the input to characters in the German alphabet
